entry.title: Insect Repellant Coleman® StingEze Max2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 3.25

Coleman® StingEze Max2

Longest lasting relief with StingEze Max2

Coleman knows the outdoors, their insect repellents and outdoor gear are here to help make sure FUN is the center of your time outside. Welcome back to the great outdoors, made better with Coleman. Longest lasting relief with StingEze.

The active ingredient in SOME relief products is ammonia, which can dry out your skin and promote the growth of bacteria. Even in low concentrations, ammonia can irritate your eyes and cause your skin to burn and swell.

The Benefit of Benzocaine in StingEze

The primary active ingredient in StingEze insect bite relief products, however, is the topical pain reliever Benzocaine, a milder, more effective alternative to ammonia. It's commonly used in a variety of other skin care products like sunscreens and anti-itch creams.

In addition to Benzocaine, StingEze contains three other key ingredients:

  • Phenol — Relieves pain, kills germs and reduces the risk of infection
  • Camphor — Inhibits the growth of bacteria and provides a cooling effect
  • Propylene Glycol — An organic compound that helps prevent the skin from drying

All of these key ingredients come together to create a highly effective insect bite relief product that stops pain, relieves itching and reduces swelling — all without irritating your skin.

 

  • With double the benzocaine, our StingEze Max formula provides instant relief for your worst bites & stings.

    • Provides instant sting relief from mosquito bites, bee stings, ticks, chiggers & fire ants
    • Triple-action formula stops pain, eliminates itching and reduces swelling
    • Counteracts negative reactions to bites and stings
    • Benzocaine based formula (* Ammonia Free)
    • With a convenient sponge dauber applicator
    • Ingredients

      Active: Benzocaine 10%, Phenol 1.35%
      Inactive: Camphor, Menthly lactate, Propylene glycol, SD Alcohol 40B 20%, Water

    • QTY-6

entry.title: Insect Repellant Coleman® SkinSmart® Insect Repellent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 5.95

 Coleman® SkinSmart® Insect Repellent

DEET-free insect repellent that provides 8 hour protection for the whole family

Coleman knows the outdoors, their insect repellents and outdoor gear are here to help make sure FUN is the center of your time outside. Welcome back to the great outdoors, made better with Coleman.

    • Featuring IR3535 – a CDC recommended DEET-free active ingredient
    • Odorless, fast-drying formula with dry feel technology for non-greasy coverage
    • Complete protection against mosquitoes and ticks
    • Repels mosquitoes that may carry Zika, Dengue Fever, Yellow Fever, West Nile Virus, and Chikungunya

    Why use SkinSmart?

    Mosquitoes can spoil a family camping trip, and hitchhiking ticks can make you paranoid about taking a shortcut across an open field, but you can feel confident when using SkinSmart. SkinSmart provides up to 8 hours of protection from ticks and mosquitoes without the wet application of other repellents; this DEET alternative goes on dry for the whole family. No time to wash after coming in from outside, no problem. SkinSmart is tough on insects but gentle on skin.
    • QTY-6

entry.title: First Aid Coleman® PERSONAL SURVIVAL First Aid Tin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 5.95

Coleman® PERSONAL SURVIVAL First Aid Tin

Simple safety, Coleman®is proud to introduce their PERSONAL SURVIVAL First Aid Tin -  features unique new pocket sized first aid tins!

These retro, reusable brushed metal tins are filled with the most commonly used first aid components, making them handy little items to keep in your car, throw in your child's sports bag, or add to your camping gear.
Outdoor safety is more than just keeping the bugs away – you need to be prepared for just about everything. That's why we recommend Coleman® First Aid, a unique, conveniently sized line of First Aid Kits made for everything outdoors. Whether you're at soccer with the kids or on an outdoor adventure, Coleman® First Aid will keep you safe and prepared. Also on ColemanFirstAid.com are helpful checklists that can be used when preparing for hiking, camping and common emergencies.
    • 74 piece kit offers an expanded inventory of the most commonly used first aid components, including waterproof matches
    • Nostalgic brushed metal tinplate, with a hinge top
    • Embossed first aid cross for easy identification in the dark
    • Environmentally conscious - 100% recyclable

  • PERSONAL SURVIVAL Tin Contents

    • 6 - Bandage 1" x 3"
    • 6 - Small Bandage
    • 4 - Butterfly Bandage
    • 2 - Spot Bandage
    • 2 - Knuckle Bandage
    • 5 - Antiseptic Wipe
    • 3 - Sting Relief Wipe
    • 1 - 2" Large Safety Pin
    • 1 - 1" Small Safety Pin
    • 2 - Antibiotic Ointment
    • 40 - Waterproof Match
    • 1 - Razor Blade
    • 1 - Reusable Tin
    Crush-resistant tins protect contents

entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 3.25

Candles Coleman® Scented Citronella Tin Candles, S'Mores, Pine, Campfire

Rest & Relax just got better, the fresh scents of Coleman® Scented Citronella Tin Candles, S'Mores, Pine, & Campfire make your summer memories burn bright.

Coleman knows the outdoors, their insect repellents, candles and outdoor gear are here to help make sure FUN is the center of your time outside. Welcome back to the great outdoors, made better with Coleman.

  • Scented Citronella tin candles with crackle wick*
  • Available in Pine, Campfire or S'mores scents
  • Burn up to 25 hours
  • 100% recyclable, nostalgic embossed tins
  • 6.0 Ounce Tin

Tips for citronella candles use

Trim candlewick to 1/4 inch each time before burning and remove any foreign material or liquids from the candle. Avoid flare-ups by never putting anything that can burn in the candle. Keep the candle away from heat sources and do not use water to extinguish the wick. Liquids can expand flames or splatter wax. Do not burn for more than 4 hours at a time and discontinue use when 1/2 inch or less of wax remains. Before moving extinguish wick and let wax harden.
  • Scented Citronella tin candles with crackle wick*
  • Available in Pine, Campfire or S'mores scents
  • Burn up to 25 hours
  • 100% recyclable, nostalgic embossed tins
  • 6.0 Ounce Tin
  • 3 Fragrances, S'mores, Pine, Campfire
  • QTY-6
